snippet: There are plenty of Americans abroad who are either on the move or rumored to be changing clubs.
abstract: There are plenty of Americans abroad who are either on the move or rumored to be changing clubs.
lead_paragraph: The European transfer window opened on Jan. 1, and that, combined with the buildup to the Mexican Primera Division's Clausura season, means that there are plenty of Americans abroad who are either on the move or rumored to be changing clubs.

headline.main: Gazing Through the Transfer Window at a Few Americans
